r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Mcmaster University. The average
  contract duration was 0.81 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $78.8K. The longest
  contract was 3.82 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $630.0K.
lookup_name: 'MCMASTER UNIVERSITY'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '64'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '4'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '6%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '78%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.25'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '130.6K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.81'
s421_mean_contract_value: '78.8K'
s425_max_duration: '3.82'
s422_max_contract_value: '630.0K'
---
